item.title: Side Project Feasibility
item.description: Itâ€™s common for developers to work on side projects. The reason why developers work on a side project is a long list of imaginable and unimaginable reasons. My main reason to work on a side project is to learn how things work or to build a utility program for use. One of my recent projects is to monitor the internet traffic and aggregate the traffic based on the domain name - bandwidth monitor.
